chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to a movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通Indigenous people in Taiwan 充滿活力的台灣原住民.json

chunks.chunk_text: 歡迎收聽口說英語通我是齊彬老師In this unit, we're going to talk about indigenous people in Taiwan.在這個單元裡面,我們要來練習怎麼用英語來介紹台灣的原住民
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通Indigenous people in Taiwan 充滿活力的台灣原住民.json

chunks.chunk_text: The indigenous people have been living in Taiwan for thousands of years. There are 16 officially recognized indigenous tribes in Taiwan, and each of them has their own native languages and culture. Research shows that Taiwan's indigenous people are considered Austronesian or Austronesian-speaking people.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通Indigenous people in Taiwan 充滿活力的台灣原住民.json

chunks.chunk_text: They belong to the same language family as those in Southeast Asia, Oceania, and Madagascar.Among them, the biggest six are Amis, Paiwan, Tayal, Bunon, Piyuma, and Rukai.There are many ways to enjoy indigenous culture.In Hualien, there is an indigenous wood carving museum.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通Indigenous people in Taiwan 充滿活力的台灣原住民.json

chunks.chunk_text: The annual festival of Austronesian cultures is held in Taitung.There is also the National Museum of Prehistory in Taitung.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通Indigenous people in Taiwan 充滿活力的台灣原住民.json

chunks.chunk_text: You can also use it as a noun.Indigenous is a more respectful term, so try to use indigenous as much as possible.Introducing indigenous people can be done in terms of tribe, language, and culture.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通Indigenous people in Taiwan 充滿活力的台灣原住民.json

chunks.chunk_text: The indigenous people have been living in Taiwan for thousands of years.

chunks.chunk_text: R-considered就是被认为是。

chunks.chunk_text: The biggest six are Amis, Paiwan, Tayal, Bunon, Puyuma,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通Indigenous people in Taiwan 充滿活力的台灣原住民.json

chunks.chunk_text: and Rukai.Among them, the biggest six are Amis, Paiwan, Tayal, Bunon, Piyuma, and Rukai.There are many ways to enjoy indigenous culture.In Hualien, there is an indigenous wood carving museum.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通Indigenous people in Taiwan 充滿活力的台灣原住民.json

chunks.chunk_text: There are many ways too.The annual festival of Austronesian cultures is held in Taitung.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通Indigenous people in Taiwan 充滿活力的台灣原住民.json

chunks.chunk_text: Be held 是个片语,举行,举办。There is also the National Museum of Prehistory in Taitung 在台东,还有国立台湾史前文化博物馆。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通Indigenous people in Taiwan 充滿活力的台灣原住民.json

chunks.chunk_text: Harvest 就是收获的意思,而Festival 就是传统的节庆。

chunks.chunk_text: Words and phrases 词汇片语

chunks.chunk_text: Indigenous 形容词,当地的,本土的,土生土长的Officially 形容词,官方的,正式的Recognize 动词,正式承认,认可,认定Tribe 名词,部落,种族Native

chunks.chunk_text: 形容词,天生的,出生地的Research 名词,研究,调查,探究Belong to 片语,属于,是,的成员Wood carving 名词,木雕,木刻Festival 名词

chunks.chunk_text: 节日,喜庆日Prehistory 名词,史前时代史这个单元我们讲的是Indigenous People in Taiwan 台湾的原住民,希望您都学会了OK, that's all for this unit 最后请记得,每日十分钟让您变成英语通我是启禀老师Until then, see you next time
